Text:
Thank you to the uploader, but can you please seed for a week or so.

There are roughly 345 leechers and tpb says 2 seeders, however, I show ZERO seeders and ONLY  93.1% available.  It has never hit 100% yet and it appears that it was never completely seeded.

There is obviously a LOT of interest, so can the original seeder please seed for a few days.

Thanks again!

The book is available here:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7341595/Vietnamese_Language_Learning_Pack_%28Updated%29
File number 43
The size is smaller, but it looks like the same book

Many thanks to  Yukkawq  who is absolutely correct.  The link and file number 43 is the same book.  I downloaded it and it is of excellent quality.  Very readable.

This book has lots of graphics, so I imagine that this copy may have even better graphics, but it is not necessary.  The book at the other link is just fine.  I will leave this dl running just in case it ever completes so I can compare it, but for anyone who can not complete this download, just go to the other torrent as it is seeded well and downloads quite quick.

Thanks again to  Yukkawq
